database.description: Necessary info to connect with the database

teamfile.description: Path to the file which contains all teams of the league with their references

matchsfile.description: Path to the file which contains matchs to load in the database with the format: TEMPORADA DIVISION JORNADA PARTIDO yyyy-yyyy xÂª x equipo local equipo visi x-x

predictionsfile.description: Path to the file with the result of the predictions

predictor.description: Path where to create the necessary files for train, test and wherte to save the models

workspace.description: Path to the folder where the application will create all intermediate files and save resutls
